channel.title: Easier way to trade on RuneScape 2007
channel.description:
Basically, there is a website that tracks offers that contain "Buy" or "Sell" in a message. This website allows you add your own filter so you can find a certain item you are trying to purchase, plus it even shows the messages at real-time. The site is called Terafate, and it is extremely helpful when it comes to trading. I just thought I'd share it with everyone.
http://www.terafate.com
I made a video about it here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KV82hAqk7m0

item.title: Easier way to trade on RuneScape 2007
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

That’s the thing. Everyone thinks they can do it, so 5 people make one. Then we all end up on different sites. Would just be better if there was just one great site that everyone connected to.

Read full topic
item.source: Easier way to trade on RuneScape 2007

item.title: Easier way to trade on RuneScape 2007
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:16, topic:506876”][quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=625108.msg4256583#msg4256583 date=1362863680]

He would’ve achieved a much nicer looking theme to the site if he had just even used the default theme for bootstrap, he wouldn’t have had to do any work. The current design and layout is… eh… yeah lol.
[/quote]Not only does it look bad, it’s not user-friendly. How am I supposed to link a specific item to somebody else? I can’t because he didn’t use hashchange or URL changing.

It’s only meant for a single person tool.[/quote]
It also doesn’t have a fall back for if the user has JavaScript turned off, that’s a bit of a huge flaw.

Read full topic
item.source: Easier way to trade on RuneScape 2007

He would’ve achieved a much nicer looking theme to the site if he had just even used the default theme for bootstrap, he wouldn’t have had to do any work. The current design and layout is… eh… yeah lol.
[/quote]Not only does it look bad, it’s not user-friendly. How am I supposed to link a specific item to somebody else? I can’t because he didn’t use hashchange or URL changing.[/quote]
It’s only meant for a single person tool.

item.title: Easier way to trade on RuneScape 2007
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:14, topic:506876”][quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=625108.msg4256583#msg4256583 date=1362863680]

He would’ve achieved a much nicer looking theme to the site if he had just even used the default theme for bootstrap, he wouldn’t have had to do any work. The current design and layout is… eh… yeah lol.
[/quote]Not only does it look bad, it’s not user-friendly. How am I supposed to link a specific item to somebody else? I can’t because he didn’t use hashchange or URL changing.

I didn’t even look into it, I took a look at the homepage and left. But that’s a big pain in the arse there. If Speljohan or vortex finishes runefeed hopefully it’s better than this. This is nice but something more efficient will be out very soon more than likely. Does the site have a fall back for if JavaScript is turned off? I can’t check on my phone lol[/quote]No.

Read full topic

item.title: Easier way to trade on RuneScape 2007
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:13, topic:506876”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=625108.msg4256544#msg4256544 date=1362855570]
He would’ve achieved a much nicer looking theme to the site if he had just even used the default theme for bootstrap, he wouldn’t have had to do any work. The current design and layout is… eh… yeah lol.
[/quote]Not only does it look bad, it’s not user-friendly. How am I supposed to link a specific item to somebody else? I can’t because he didn’t use hashchange or URL changing.[/quote]
I didn’t even look into it, I took a look at the homepage and left. But that’s a big pain in the arse there. If Speljohan or vortex finishes runefeed hopefully it’s better than this. This is nice but something more efficient will be out very soon more than likely. Does the site have a fall back for if JavaScript is turned off? I can’t check on my phone lol

item.title: Easier way to trade on RuneScape 2007
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“RSCShadow, post:10, topic:506876”]Terrible looking site.

[quote=sinisoul]No, iirc terafate told me it has something to do with a js library[/quote]Explain?

Also, in your video you stated the GE was implemented in 2008, which is wrong. It was late 2007.[/quote]
Thanks for finding my mistake. Also, I don’t really look at information with an aesthetic view, so I could care less about the appearance of the website.

Read full topic

Correct, reading the chat packets and formatting them accordingly.
